content: chair back and arm pieces > although this pattern is a chair back doily so many enjoy making it as shawl similar to doris chan s exploded lace patterns you can use worsted weight yarn and a j/6 00mm hook to make a shawl **size ** * chair back 10 x 16 inches 25 4 x 40 6 cm * arm pieces 7 x 10 inches 17 8 x 25 4 cm
